name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultimate Sharing Tool for Social Media

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that helps you easily share a link on social media such as Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and many others

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A free link sharing tool for social media platforms

üíØ Free features
‚úì Share a link on social media with a single click
‚úì Customize which social media platforms to show
‚úì View accuracy information about the domain (limited to some users)
‚úì Remember your ratings for each domain (limited to some users)

üôè  This extension is provided as part of a research project that aims to tackle the issue of misinformation. This study is conducted by researchers at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) in order to examine various approaches to combat misinformation. Your participation in this study is voluntary, and you can stop using the browser extension at any time. When the results of the research are made public, no information will be included that would reveal your identity. We do not provide data to any third party.
